docs.snippet: Seven-times champions AC Milan landed a tough tie against PSV Eindhoven in Friday's draw for the Champions League playoff round which was clouded by uncertainty over the participation of Fenerbahce and Metalist Kharkiv....
docs.lead_paragraph: Seven-times champions AC Milan landed a tough tie against PSV Eindhoven in Friday's draw for the Champions League playoff round which was clouded by uncertainty over the participation of Fenerbahce and Metalist Kharkiv.

headline.main: Milan to Face PSV in Champions League Playoff

docs.snippet: The 10-date package provides programming for Fox Sports 1 and gives horse racing valuable exposure beyond the Triple Crown and the Breeders’ Cup....
docs.lead_paragraph: The 10-date package provides programming for Fox Sports 1 and gives horse racing valuable exposure beyond the Triple Crown and the Breeders’ Cup.
docs.abstract: Fox Sports is getting into the horse racing business, entering a multiyear agreement with the Jockey Club to present prominent graded stakes races, beyond Triple Crown and Breeders' Cup, on television starting in 2014.

headline.main: Fox Sports Will Present Horse Racing Package
headline.print_headline: Fox Sports Will Present Horse Racing Package

docs.snippet: In a story Aug. 9 about a shooting rampage that left four people dead, The Associated Press, relying on information from Dallas police, erroneously reported that Erbie Bowser was charged with four counts of capital murder. He is charged with three...
docs.lead_paragraph: In a story Aug. 9 about a shooting rampage that left four people dead, The Associated Press, relying on information from Dallas police, erroneously reported that Erbie Bowser was charged with four counts of capital murder. He is charged with three counts of capital murder.

docs.snippet: As the fee fight between Time Warner Cable and CBS threatens to prevent millions of Americans from viewing major sporting events this weekend, fans will be hanging out in bars, hooking up antennas, and firing up laptops to get around the blackout....
docs.lead_paragraph: As the fee fight between Time Warner Cable and CBS threatens to prevent millions of Americans from viewing major sporting events this weekend, fans will be hanging out in bars, hooking up antennas, and firing up laptops to get around the blackout.

headline.main: Vexed Viewers Find Workarounds for CBS-TWC Spat
